```shell
# python -c 'import sys; print(sys.getfilesystemencoding())'
ANSI_X3.4-1968
```
and I already carry debian/patches/deb_no_utf8  (debian branch) which tunes some tests to avoid utf-8 in them,  but as this pain shows -- tests should be smarter to either not use unicode on systems where unicode is not supported, or just skip those tests.
For now I will need to adjust the patch :-/
